transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Ji, good evening sir.
Customer: Number mujhe aata dusra kaun tha wo whatsapp wala? Mera apna hai.
Executive: Aapka nahi jo koi mera whatsapp hai. Mera apna, main yahan se image bhej sakti hu aisa kaunsa number hai?
Customer: Ek second, ek second, main aapko hi number bhej rahi hu na, ek second dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Bhejiye, bhejiye.
Executive: Haan, phone disconnect mat karna sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Kuch share karna hai aapko?
Customer: Haan wo by lead share karna hai.
Executive: Haan, haan, maine bheja aapko, dekho.
Customer: Nahi aaya.
Customer: Shayad maine pehle wale number pe. Haan, haan, wo maine pehle wale number pe bhej diya.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, isme bhej diya.
Executive: 93 wala, haan, haan, theek hai. Ye first number kiska hai sir?
Customer: Wo mere partner ka hai. Aa gaya.
Executive: Haan, haan, isse aap mujhe share karo, kya share karna hai, by lead wagera jo sold out hoti hai wo share karoge?
Customer: Haan, wahi, wahi share karna hai madam. Abhi kya hai wo payment. Abhi aapka jo wo bhi khatam hone wala hai abhi to kya hai?
Executive: Haan, mujhe share karo abhi, call pe rehna, main dekhti hu kya problem hai. Hai na? Aur aapne apne executive se baat ki, sir, by lead kaun consume karta hai? Aap consume karte ho ya aapne jo banda bitha rakha hai kaam karne ke liye wo?
Customer: Main, main hi karta hu.
Executive: Aap karte ho? Aur buyer se baat kaun karta hai? Jab by lead consume hone ke baad karte hai?
Customer: Ye, ye, ye mujhe wo IndiaMART ke andar mail karna hai iska. To mujhe by lead nahi mil rahi hai. Mera paisa hai wo IndiaMART mein waste hi ja raha hai.
Executive: Sold out ho ja rahi hai sir by lead hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye kitne second purani thi?
Customer: 10 second, dekho na side mein abhi likha hua hai, dekh lo.
Executive: Hmm, this by lead is already consumed by maximum permissible seller, explore other activity leads before they expire. Haan, aur isse pehle jo aapne mujhe bheji thi wo bhi is tarah ki thi hai na?
Customer: Ye sabhi mujhe mail karni hai to kaise karenge?
Executive: Haan, mail karni hai aapko, aap ek second. Main aapko ek cheez batau sir? Aap ek extension lagana sold out wali by lead ke liye, batau main aapko?
Customer: Haan, abhi matlab aap ye batao jo aap by lead by lead consume karte ho wo laptop se karte ho ya aap phone se karte ho?
Customer: Laptop se, mobile se dono.
Executive: Dono se? To main aapko na usse laptop pe bata rahi hu, bataungi, aap na usko laptop pe wo extension lagana, usse pata hai kya hota hai? Ki jaise ye aapki by lead jo ye consume ho rahi hai na. Bar bar aapko mil nahi rahi hai. Ye is wajah se nahi mil rahi, iska reason pehle aap jaano ye kyun nahi mil rahi hai. Jaise koi by lead aati hai hai na? Aur aapka jo product hai, aapka jo product hai uski demand bahut jyada hai, aapko bhi pata hai. Hai na? To aapke jaise seller bhi bahut sare hai IndiaMART par. To wo bahut jaldi, jaise 10 second hue is by lead ko to wo ek second mein hi consume kar lete hai. To ek by lead ko maximum paanch seller consume karte hai. Hai na? Theek hai? To aapko kya hai?
Customer: Haan. To aapko main ek cheez batau. Mera beech mein saaf hai tabhi aapko itne ko. Nahi, nahi, main aapko isse, isse bachne ke liye main aapko ek cheez bataungi.
Customer: Kaise bolte ho wo? Jab bhaiya payment karoge to hi aapki baat aapki baat milegi. Payment ke liye kya bolte ho kya trick dena payment jaise bolte ho to madam. Nahi, nahi, aap meri baat samajhiye, main aapko jo ye sold out wali problem hai na.
Customer: Abhi aapke wo payment aapka kya wo khatam hone wala hai na abhi to plan. Baad mein bolna kya ki payment. Kaise bolna?
Executive: Nahi, nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting buyleads.

- Customer's money is being wasted.

- Wants to know how to get buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive shared that buyleads are consumed quickly.

- Suggested installing an extension on the laptop.

- Explained how the extension helps with buylead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, sold out, extension, consumption
